---
title:        "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$document$title`"
designator:   "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$document$designator`"
pages:        "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$document$pages`"
abstract:     "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$abstract`"
degree:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$gettingDegree`"
author:
  name:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$fullname`"
  department: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$department`"
  rank:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$rank`"
  service:    "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$service`"
  degree:     "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$currentDegree`"
distribution_statement:
  A: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_statement$A`"
  B: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_statement$B`"
  C: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_statement$C`"
  D: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_statement$D`"
  E: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_statement$E`"
  F: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_statement$F`"
distribution_reason:
  dms:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$dms`"
  swd:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$swd`"
  fgi:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$fgi`"
  cpe:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$cpe`"
  pri:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$pri`"
  crt:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$crt`"
  pre:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$pre`"
  aou:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$aou`"
  tne:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$tne`"
  aut:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$aut`"
  exp:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$exp`"
  vul:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$vul`"
  ops:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_reason$ops`"
rationale:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$distribution_rationale`"
authority:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$release_authority`"
condition:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$release_condition`"
advisor:    "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$advisor$name`"
dept_head:  "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$dept_head`"
date:       "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%d %b %Y')`"
output: AFIT:::distro_form
---
